entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider aliasing user-secrets CLI command as dev-secrets #39897
  • Unexpected exception using WsFederation authentication with React SPA template #39896
  • SignalR HttpContext access #39894
  • Different behavior for guid constraint with Swagger in Controllers and Minimal APIs #39886
  • SignalR can't invoke server method from client with throttled connection #39885
  • Perf regression: endpoint #39883

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly doesn't load symbols for debugging #38413
    .NET 7 Planning
  • License template is used without applied year and contributors #34340
  • UseHttpLogging not working .NET 6 RC 1 #37577 and the answer You need to have information level logging for HttpLogging to show up, right now you're set at warning level #39701
  • Disconnect event takes 10 minutes to trigger #39666
  • Async minimal route handlers don't serialize child members #39856
  • Receiving error when invoking IDistributedCache.SetAsync: Wrong number of args calling Redis command From Lua script #39879
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload fails with websocket error #39891
  • Publish Blazor WASM application to Azure App service fails #39869
  • ASP .NET Core Razor Page Data Annotations Localizations fail #39849
  • Starting the Server from WebApplicationFactory #39893
  • /_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js not found #39888
  • RedisCache update in .NET 6 breaks usage against older redis servers #38715
    6.0.2
  • Injecting IAccessTokenProvider failing when using custom AuthenticationStateProvider - Blazor Wasm #39304
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor server Safari fullscreen issue #39726
  • Document the public API for Static Web Assets #34976
    7.0-preview2
  • [WebAssembly hosted in .net core] Make scoped service session dependant #38764
    Discussions
  • Design proposal: Multiple same-named event handlers #39815
    7.0-preview2
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted App startup Project issue #39878
  • Blazor does not passes typeparam TItem into EventCallback through attribute [CascadingTypeParameter(nameof(TItem))] #39847
  • Duplicated client assemblies after publish #39884
  • Sections doesn't populate from partials. #39830
  • Minimize Blazor Server state stored per circuit #39882

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce build steps in our pipelines #39899
  • Disable component governance in Linux_musl_x64_build #39898
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.2.22078.1 #39895
    area-infrastructure
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security

Merged

  • Consistently serialize child members returned from route handlers #39858
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • Only call IsSelfSigned() once #39877
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #39874
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-preview2
  • Improve App build reliability and performance #39870
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3d81736` to `28e1da2` #39887
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [7.0-preview1] Update precedence of templates for 7.0 #39794
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [Blazor] JS root component registration #37180
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview2
  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) on ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #39865
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    blocked, area-infrastructure
